Prove that fr+1,…,fm\mathbf{f}_{r+1}, \ldots, \mathbf{f}_{m}fr+1​,…,fm​ may be reordered, as necessary, so that {e1,…er+1,fr+2,…,fm}\left\{\mathbf{e}_{1}, \ldots \mathbf{e}_{r+1}, \mathbf{f}_{r+2}, \ldots, \mathbf{f}_{m}\right\}{e1​,…er+1​,fr+2​,…,fm​} spans VVV.

    Suppose that {e1,…,en}\left\{\mathbf{e}_{1}, \ldots, \mathbf{e}_{n}\right\}{e1​,…,en​} is a linearly independent set of distinct elements of VVV and that {f1,…,fm}\left\{\mathbf{f}_{1}, \ldots, \mathbf{f}_{m}\right\}{f1​,…,fm​} spans VVV. Show that n⩽mn \leqslant mn⩽m.

    A=(12−1−3−112−4),B=(1−120012−4)A=\left(\begin{array}{rrrr} 1 & 2 & -1 & -3 \\ -1 & 1 & 2 & -4 \end{array}\right), \quad B=\left(\begin{array}{rrrr} 1 & -1 & 2 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 2 & -4 \end{array}\right)A=(1−1​21​−12​−3−4​),B=(10​−11​22​0−4​)
